SEARCH
Module ex6
Package ex6

Class IncAgent

java.lang.Object
ex6.IncAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Agent
public class IncAgent extends Object implements Agent
Represents an Increment Agent that subscribes to a topic, increments the received value by 1, and publishes the result to one or more topics.

  • Constructor Details

    • IncAgent

      public IncAgent(String[] subs, String[] pubs)
      Constructor for IncAgent.
      Parameters:
      subs - Array of subscription topic names. Must contain exactly one topic.
      pubs - Array of publication topic names. Must contain at least one topic.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number of subscription or publication topics is incorrect.
